metadata.title: CVE-2022-40899 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue discovered in Python Charmers Future 0.18.2 and earlier allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service via crafted Set-Cookie headerfrom malicious web server.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-40899` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-future - 0.15.2-4ubuntu2.1
python3-future - 0.15.2-4ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-future package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.15.2-4ubuntu2.1').
